retrieval.storage.index

Class Index

  • java.lang.Object
    • retrieval.storage.index.Index
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    IndexMultiThread

    public abstract class Index
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is an abstract class for index This implements a hight level index, it means that you can add pictures, delete pictures, get similar pictures...

      List of tests vectors Each test vector contains its own index (for visual words)

    • Method Detail

      • addPicture

        public abstract java.lang.Long addPicture(java.awt.image.BufferedImage image,
                                          java.lang.Long id,
                                          java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> properties,
                                          int N,
                                          int resizeMethod,
                                          int sizeOfPatchW,
                                          int sizeOfPatchH,
                                          boolean sync)
                                   throws AlreadyIndexedException,
                                          NoValidPictureException,
                                          PictureTooHomogeneous
        Add a picture to index
        Parameters:
        image - Image to index
        id - Image id
        properties - Image properties
        N - Number of patches
        resizeMethod - Method for resizing patches
        sizeOfPatchW - Size of patch (w)
        sizeOfPatchH - Size of patch (h)
        sync - Use sync or async method
        Throws:
        AlreadyIndexedException - Picture is already indexed
        NoValidPictureException - Picture is not valid
        PictureTooHomogeneous

      • fillNBT

        public abstract java.util.List<java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentHashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Long>> fillNBT(java.util.List<java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentHashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Long>> visualWordsByTestVector)
        Fill structure in argument with nbt an return it Central server will ask NBT for this server during the search process.
        Parameters:
        visualWordsByTestVector - Map of visual words for each tests vector
        Returns:
        Map of visual words and their NBT for each tests vector

      • computeSimilarity

        public abstract java.util.List<ResultSim> computeSimilarity(java.util.List<java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentHashMap<java.lang.String,RequestPictureVisualWord>> visualWordsByTestVector,
                                                            int Niq)
        Compute similarity thanks to structure in argument and Niq
        Parameters:
        visualWordsByTestVector - Visual words for request picture IQ
        Niq - Number of patch generated by Iq
        Returns:
        Ordered lists of similar pictures (ordered by similarities with Iq)
